Description.Text: Kaskades South Beach is part of the Menin Hospitality Collection and is located adjacent to its sister property, Gale South Beach which has won 2 awards of excellence in historical preservation and design. Kaskades South Beach features 24 exclusive guest rooms with marble wet rooms, steam enclave rain showers, duel vanity, signature guyandgirl bath amenities, Nespresso coffee makers, oversized closets, desk, in room safe, 55‚Äù flatscreen, custom cool gel beds with fine Italian linens, private balcony and ample living space to relax and rejuvenate. Each stay includes VIP express check-in at the Guest Lounge, continental breakfast, sunset happy hour with wine and refreshments, rooftop pool access with unobstructed panorama views, shuttle service around South Beach via the Menin Mobile, and private beach club.
